text: The Parent Trap is a 1998 American romantic comedy movie co-written and directed by Nancy Meyers, and produced and co-written by Charles Shyer. It is a remake of the 1961 movie of the same name. Dennis Quaid and Natasha Richardson star as a divorced couple who separated shortly after their identical twin daughters' birth; Lindsay Lohan stars (in her movie debut) as both twins. ==References== Category:1998 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies about twins Category:Movies about sisters Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Movies set in California Category:Disney movie remakes Category:Movies composed by Alan Silvestri Category:Movies based on books Category:American movie remakes
title: The Parent Trap (1998 movie)
